Title: A Simple Sacrifice (2)
Plot: Boyd and the team continue their investigation of the Annie Kee case, and try to locate her son who was present during the murders.
GuestStars: Lynda Bellingham,  Janet Dale,  Valerie Gogan,  Elliot Henderson-Boyle,  Nicholas Hoult,  Cal Macaninch,  Anthony Valentine,  Nicholas Woodeson,  Rakie Ayola,  Robert Blythe,  Harriet Walter
